dialog.activityGapText1: You were tracking work on {{$alias}} while your computer was off or the browser was closed. Last activity: {{$lastActivity}} at {{$lastTime}}.
dialog.activityGapText2: Do you want to finalise this worklog and continue from {{$returnTime}}?
dialog.confirmImportText: Replace your current settings with the imported configuration?
dialog.confirmTopicRemovalText: Remove the topic "{{$alias}}" ({{$key}}) from your tracking list?
dialog.discardWorklogText: Discard changes for worklog from {{$startTime}}–{{$endTime}} for {{$issue}}?
dialog.splitTrackingInfo: You are tracking work on {{$label}} since {{$time}}.
empty.noTimeLogged: No time logged for this week.
error.domainNotFound: Could not find a Jira instance for this domain.
error.issueBrokenReadd: Issue data corrupted — please re-add via 'Add Issue'.
footer.designedBy: Designed and developed by Florian Riedel. © 2022
info.betaLocale: This locale is machine translated and may not be optimal. If you have any improvements, please open a localization ticket with your suggestions.
info.domainSetup: Enter your Jira server URL, like https://your-domain.atlassian.net. The app will recognise your setup and ask for access if required.
info.extendedCommentsDesc: Show comments in the worklog list and add one while tracking.
info.firefoxSyncWarning: For Firefox this setting is always inactive. Due to browser restrictions it is neccesary to open jira in a new tab and use that tab for synchronization.
info.issueTrackingInstructions: Add all issues you want to track. You can assign each an alias.
info.jqlAutoSelect: Automatically select issues based on a custom JQL query.
info.jqlExtendTemplates: You can extend the available templates or create your own:
info.jqlQueryInstructions: Set a custom JQL query to auto-add issues to your list (up to 15).
info.offlineTopicsDesc: Create topics to group and categorise your worklogs.
legal.accountabilityText1: The contents of our pages have been created with the utmost care. However, we cannot guarantee the contents' accuracy, completeness or topicality. According to statutory provisions, we are furthermore responsible for our own content on these web pages. In this matter, please note that we are not obliged to monitor the transmitted or saved information of third parties, or investigate circumstances pointing to illegal activity.
legal.accountabilityText2: Our obligations to remove or block the use of information under generally applicable laws remain unaffected by this as per §§ 8 to 10 of the Telemedia Act (TMG).
legal.copyrightText1: Our web pages and their contents are subject to German copyright law. Unless expressly permitted by law, every form of utilizing, reproducing or processing works subject to copyright protection on our web pages requires the prior consent of the respective owner of the rights.
legal.copyrightText2: Individual reproductions of a work are only allowed for private use. The materials from these pages are copyrighted and any unauthorized use may violate copyright laws.
legal.linksText1: Responsibility for the content of external links (to web pages of third parties) lies solely with the operators of the linked pages.
legal.linksText2: No violations were evident to us at the time of linking. Should any legal infringement become known to us, we will remove the respective link immediately.
legal.personalDataText: We do not use or store Your personal data.
legal.securityText: The security of Your Personal Data is important to Us, but remember that no method of transmission over the Internet, or method of electronic storage is 100% secure. While We strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect Your Personal Data, We cannot guarantee its absolute security.
legal.title: Legal Disclosure
legal.tmgSection5: Information in accordance with Section 5 TMG
legal.trackingText1: We use the browser storage to store essential information for the functionality of this addon. This includes your options, unsynced issues and cached requests.
legal.trackingText2: We do not use any form of tracking, and we do not pass your information to any third party.
legal.usageDataText: No Usage Data is collected when using the extension.
message.selectIssueToTrack: Select an issue to start tracking.
message.noIssueToTrack: No topics to track. Add topics in the options.
nav.firstWeek: Go to first week of year
nav.lastWeek: Go to last week of year
options.apiTokenInfo: An API token can be generated via your Atlassian profile.
options.cookieAuthInfo: Use your session cookie to connect. Requires an active session.
options.emailAddressInfo: The email address you used for your Atlassian account.
options.errorConnectingJira: Unable to connect. Check your server URL and token.
options.firefoxLimitations: Due to technical limitations Firefox is only partially supported.
options.noPermissionJira: No permission to access the Jira API: Click this message to grant access.
options.personalAccessTokenInfo: A personal access token can be generated via your Jira profile.
options.selectConnectionMode: Select either local mode or setup access to your Jira server. In local mode all data will be kept on your machine. If you connect to a Jira server the extension will try to synchronize your worklogs to a connected Tempo instance.
options.tempoApiTokenInfo: To access the Tempo REST API an access token with the right to manage and view worklogs is needed. Without token synchronization will be disabled.
tooltip.exportContent: This export contains the issue list and the server url. The personal access token and the username are not included in the export.
tooltip.invalidToken: Invalid token. Provide a correct token in the options.
tooltip.noActiveJiraSession: No active Jira Session for the selected user. Log into Jira to synchronize.
tooltip.noConnectionJira: No connection — synchronisation and refresh unavailable.
tooltip.noConnectionJiraStatistics: No connection to Jira instance - only cached statistics available.
tooltip.noPermissionJira: No permission to access Jira Instance. Click this icon to grant access.
workday.permissionsMissing: Permissions to access Workday are missing. Click the lock-icon to grant permissions.
